Class SelfBoard.mouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • SelfBoard.mouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    SelfBoard

    public class SelfBoard.mouseListener
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
    class to listen to mouse events all across the panel
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Group 3

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      mouseListener(SelfBoard gt)
      construct a mouse listener for the entire SelfBoard panel gt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Coordinate[] makeCoordinates(int x, int y, java.lang.String shipName)
      return coordinates array from (x,y) according to size and alignment of specified ship (identified by its name)
      void mouseDragged(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      During fleet placement phase, repaint cells if dragged ship can placed
      void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      During fleet placement phase, set shipTemp to the ship that has been pressed on, provided this ship is not already placed
      void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      During fleet placement phase, place the dragged ship onto board (if possible) Disable dragging of this ship in future Reset shipTemp to null if entire fleet is placed, fire hidden submit button of this player's Screen

        public void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)

        Parameters:

        y - starting y coordinate
